title.narrative: Support to Democratic Governance Process in Timor-Leste

description.narrative: The overall objective of the proposed institutional capacity building programme is to contribute to the consolidation of peace and stability by strengthening the democratic institutions of Parliament, Justice and Media.

title.narrative: Ministers and Departmental Heads' capacities to make regular and timely reports to Parliament on budgetary performance.

description.narrative: Ministers and Departmental Heads' capacities to make regular and timely reports to Parliament on budgetary performance.

title.narrative: Ministers and Departmental Heads' capacities to make regular and timely reports to Parliament on budgetary performance.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: Ministers and Departmental Heads demonstrate the capacities to make timely (Quarterly) Reports on Budgetary Performance

comment.narrative: Ministers and Departmental Heads demonstrate the capacities to make timely (Quarterly) Reports on Budgetary Performance

actual.value: Each Minister and Departmental Head makes quarterly reports on the execution of the Budget to Parliament [as per legal requirements].
